title: Implementing Online Assessments
description:
This module is designed to introduce healthcare professionals to the fundamental principles in medical education assessment practice.
Participants will explore the foundations of evidenced based assessment theories and practice that are most suitable for use in the healthcare sector. A special focus of this module will be the implementation of authentic and valid online assessments. Formative and summative online assessments will be explored, in addition to the appropriate delivery of actionable feedback.
prerequisite: Principles of Learning and Teaching in the Professions and Principles and Applications of TEL or Completion of other relevant modules in the past 5 years can be considered on a case by case basis
